QuestData.Title: Aroom's Farewell
QuestData.Description: <The creature hoots sadly as it addresses you.>$B$BAroom is last of tribe...$B$BOthers won't rest... need funeral pyre. Bring Aroom the feathers of others.... let them rest.$B$BThen Aroom help you.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $r. Soon my kin will rest.
